remarks: Diagonal homomorphism into a structure power.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pwsdiagghm.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsdiagghm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
pwsdiagghm.f $e |- F = ( x e. B |-> ( I X. { x } ) ) $.
pwsdiagghm $p |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. W ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom Y ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d W x $.
$d Y x $.
